title: Question:
author: Loco1887
content: Which metaverse coin will perform better in 2022?

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 20, 2022, 11:42:13 PMWhich metaverse coin will perform better in 2022?Sandbox metaverse is already live but to be honest this game was very boring. It's not so attractive while ape coin is still on its development with its metaverse and i will not expect something big to come. The ape land already minted and this has been making ape token to reach its peak price. If the market was still in the bearish trend and i will not speculate about the metaverse will be performing better. Bitcoin is still become a main reason why metaverse will not give a good performance this year. I personally will pick the metaverse token which was still under 1 billion marketcap. The potential is still very big to growth to the 1 billion valuation. Ape was good.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 20, 2022, 11:42:13 PMWhich metaverse coin will perform better in 2022?Is it sandbox era already done? I think most coins and tokens on the metaverse are racing for each one but with the trend on thr apecoin, I think there is more chance or opportunity with it as they are just started their ecosystem with their recent land sale and token launch, it still too early to judge if they can beat out sandbox but in terms of profiting, of course youll choose a smaller cap and you know what it is.

comments.author: bestcoins1
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 20, 2022, 11:42:13 PMWhich metaverse coin will perform better in 2022?It's always hard to determine any future right now, but as for my personal choice and belief, then for now I'm still going to like The Sandbox (SAND) because I got some profit from the Metaverse Coin before the big dump happened so for the future I'm still very confident with The Sandbox (SAND) instead ofApeCoin (APE).

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 20, 2022, 11:42:13 PMWhich metaverse coin will perform better in 2022?None of them. Metaverse is right after its first bubble. Its the worse time to buy. All metaverse tokens will dump 95-100% from ATH - thats how every new technology is being welcomed by market. Enormous pump of everything even slightly related to metaverse, dump close to zero and than fundamental pump of good products. Just like dot.com bubble. Amazon dumped 93% from its ATH in 2000.Metaverse will be a big thing but not in 2022. Maybe in 2030 with good vr set or in 2040 with good brain chips (something like braindance in cyberpunk). Looking for investment in metaverse in 2022 is like looking at 2 random toddlers and betting which one of them will win noble prize.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: If your are asking then i am telling you that i will always goes with SAND reason SAND was one of First entry to the Metaverse and also SAND is natural but these days Ape is in Hype and hype decisions make to regret on them as SHIB and Doge made then many other examples here but but i will must SAND is doing good i can see a good future in SAND

comments.author: lornadane
comments.body: Quote from: asriloni on May 21, 2022, 02:44:47 AMQuote from: Loco1887 on May 20, 2022, 11:42:13 PMWhich metaverse coin will perform better in 2022?Sandbox metaverse is already live but to be honest this game was very boring. It's not so attractive while ape coin is still on its development with its metaverse and i will not expect something big to come. The ape land already minted and this has been making ape token to reach its peak price. If the market was still in the bearish trend and i will not speculate about the metaverse will be performing better. Bitcoin is still become a main reason why metaverse will not give a good performance this year. I personally will pick the metaverse token which was still under 1 billion marketcap. The potential is still very big to growth to the 1 billion valuation. Ape was good. Which metaverse coin do you choose and try to say which coin is the right one for you to keep, maybe you can recommend it to others too if the metaverse coin you choose can last in the long term.

comments.author: Loco1887
comments.body: People say Otherside looks way better than Sand. Do you agree?

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 21, 2022, 09:06:58 AMPeople say Otherside looks way better than Sand. Do you agree?If you are comparing ape token and sand, yeah ape token was far better. I consider this from the hype. Ape has not even launched its metaverse but the hype was so big and this is also the number 1 of metaverse token in the market. Sand is good but the hype is not as big as ape token. I do agree with other people said. I can imagine when the launch of ape metaverse will come soon. This may become the next big event

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 21, 2022, 09:06:58 AMPeople say Otherside looks way better than Sand. Do you agree?Everyone has a different side and well, there are always those who say that Sandbox is better with its metaverse, it's far from possible that Sandbox is the best-selling project but other projects are also the same as the concept of the metaverse but I can't be sure what is clear I know Sandbox longer and of course I follow its development compared to ApeCoin.So do you want to invest from both sides?ApeCoin and Sandbox have good products they are growing very fast.

comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 20, 2022, 11:42:13 PMWhich metaverse coin will perform better in 2022?Surely no one will be doing well here. Look at bitcoin, it's not doing well and the market will continue to fall this year, so don't risk investing in Sand or Ape right now. I agree with @Titanic Janusz, Metaverse is an area with real potential but it's too early to say how successful they will be. Except for the hype around Metaverse tokens, I haven't seen any value in them.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: Since sandbox is kinda already finished I guess it's just better, after all sandbox is also spending so much money for marketing, you can literally see their advertisement anywhere in any thing that are related with gaming.even in youtube, their ads are like everywhere.meanwhile ape coin is just still its early stage, you never can be sure in regard of the well being of this one altcoin unless you have seen some real progress presented, right now it's just too early to judge this coin honestly, maybe it's gonna be better than sandbox no one knows.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 20, 2022, 11:42:13 PMWhich metaverse coin will perform better in 2022?I voted Sandbox in the poll, I also just found out that ApeCoin will develop their own Metaverse. The reason I chose Sandbox is because Sandbox already has their product, while ApeCoin, they don't have a Metaverse product yet, I just looked at some local news portals and read about ApeCoin that will make their Metaverse and this is just a discussion.
